Ok, Looks like most private servers are using 3.3.5 or 3.3.5a now. I have created a torrent for the zip file containing the two patches.  One to take you from 3.3.3a to 3.3.5 And a second to take you from 3.3.5 to 3.3.5a if you need it.  I know they are everywhere, but I figured I'd add them here with a How To...
